body.name: SWSKR Acrylic Cutting Board with Counter Lip,17"x13" Large Clear Cutting Board for Kitchen Countertop,Non-Slip,60% Thicker,Perfect for Bread,Meat,Veggies & More,Great Kitchen Essential Gadgets & Decor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 4 mins
features: 【ELEVATE YOUR COOKING EXPERIENCE】Our acrylic cutting board incorporates both function and style.Crafted from 100% food-grade acrylic, this board is not only hygienic but also enhances your countertop aesthetics, becoming an absolute essential in your kitchen setup.

【PREMIUM QUALITY MATERIAL】We prioritize your safety.The clear cutting board for kitchen countertop is made from 100% food-grade acrylic material. Engineered to be lightweight yet durable, this kitchen accessory ensures your meals are prepared on a safe surface. (Note: It's not heat resistant beyond 140℉ and is not dishwasher safe.)

【INNOVATIVE DESIGN FOR EASY USE】Our clear cutting board boasts a smooth, flat surface, supplemented with 8 non-slip dots for stability and a unique lip for added convenience. Its size (17.5x13.5 inch, 5mm thickness) is perfect for maintaining cleanliness on marble and other countertops without sacrificing the beauty of your kitchen decor.

【VERSATILE KITCHEN ESSENTIAL】From cutting fruits, vegetables, and meat to preparing sandwiches, pizzas, and cakes, this acrylic cutting board is perfect for any culinary task.It can also double as a serving platter for children, a charcuterie board, and more. (Note: Acrylic material is not scratch-resistant, please avoid using it for chopping.)

【SATISFACTION GUARANTEED】Packaged securely with a protective film and cotton to ensure pristine condition upon arrival, this cutting board is a perfect gift for Thanksgiving, Christmas, or housewarming events.If, for any reason, you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, please don't hesitate to contact us.
【WARM REMINDER】Please peel off the protective film from both sides and Attach the silicone non-slip dots to the bottom of the cutting board before using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for chopping near the sink
reviews.reviewText: I don't like clutter on my counters and bought this to use for chopping food near our sink. The edge is perfect so I can slide waste right off and it looks great. It cleans easily. I did have to do a lot of chopping with a very sharp knife and it did leave knife marks in it but it was easy to clean and you can't see the marks so it doesn't bother me. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Goes where you need it
reviews.reviewText: Stays still while using. I can put it on whichever counter I'm working on. Doesn't slide around like regular cutting boards do. I can still see my beautiful countertops through it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fuctional cutting board!
reviews.reviewText: I kept seeing this item as a recommended item to purchase. All of my cutting boards would just slide around on the counter so I decided to purchase this. I am so glad I did! The little rubber stickers that go on the bottom ensure the board does not slide around. I love that it is clear as well so there is no eye sore there. I have chopped several things on it with no harm done. It is so sturdy and definitely a great new addition to my kitchen tools.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and heavy
reviews.reviewText: This came on time and was packed nicely. It does show the scratches from cutting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Acrylic Chopping Board
reviews.reviewText: Love this board. Stays put and doesn’t move around. Easy to clean and use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cutting board was for replacing other made in China cheap plastic cutting boards which keep shredding cut marks I’m seeing after each use. The plastic shreds across the surface show deep missing portions after first use and are non traceable in eating after cooking but obviously going into our stomachs and are not safe for human gut or digestive system. I’m disgusted thinking of the shred plastic particles in my family after I try so hard to cut vegetables for healthy foods to help guard against cancer but the plastics are going in! I destroyed the box or I’d return immediately! Don’t buy this poison plastics chinese board!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Don't use a steak knife on it.
reviews.reviewText: I have regular knives not plastic knives. When I got it, already had a big scratch, so was upset about that. Then I put meat on there and used a steak knife to cut it. Made large scratches. In my opinion don't waste your money. Once it scratched doesn't look good to leave out on counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these not for cutting board use but for counter top protection. Unfortunately my new kitchen counters are delicate (not t he best decision). These are perfect for work areas so I do t have to worry about chips if I put something on counter for food/ coffee prep etc. these are great. When I first received them I thought I was missing acrylic tabs in one box but they were there. Be careful when unboxing because they may fall out of box. These are perfect. Wish I had them before chipping counter.
